subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jim Calhoun left no doubt that he planned to be on the sideline Saturday to coach UConn when his team, the top seed in the West Region, plays No. 9 Texas A&M.
snippet: Jim Calhoun left no doubt that he planned to be on the sideline Saturday to coach UConn when his team, the top seed in the West Region, plays No. 9 Texas A&M.
